attributes.action: Review the way DLA is assessed to a 'face to face' evaluation of each claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DLA is curently assessed by persons unknown to the applicant and so is often refused becuase the department knows nothing about the real needs of the claimee. This results an a letter stating that 'in our opinion' you have been refused DLA.
How can the persons assessing the claim posibly have an opinion of that particular claimant?? Please make these decisions based on a face to face evaluation.
